name: Project Cornerstone
blurb: An Open world, action/adventure/puzzle game with an emphasis on physics and player-choice, for PC, Mac and Linux.

rewards.reward: No Reward

THE SMITH! Design a game item/builing or prop (no penises!... unless they're hidden!), the soundtrack, the full game, closed-beta, and of course access to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback, also mentioned in credits

(All Limited addition) Art book, T-shirts, World map poster, Game posters, Physical copy of the game, Physical copy of the soundtrack, closed-beta, and of course access to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback, also mentioned in credits.

THE STORYTELLER! Design your own game character with quest within our guidelines that will be added to the game, the soundtrack, the full game, closed-beta, and of course access to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback, also mentioned in credits.

THIS IS MY LAND! design an island as much as you want within guidelines that will be added to the game, the soundtrack, the full game, closed-beta, and of course access to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback, also mentioned in credits
THE ULTIMATE PACKAGE, THE PLEDGE TO END ALL PLEDGES! With this pledge you will get everything previous in one package.

THE PRODUCER! This is the most awesome part. Those who get this spot get to work on the game with us on all levels, like ; game design, scripting, music, lore, marketing, 3D art, concept art, level design, and all the rest of the amazing parts of creating a game. Long story short, you will basically be a team member throughout the development.

THE ADVENTURER! We will fly you here to our office and you will spend 4-7 days with the team and get to work on the project however you want, we will also keep contact during the development of the game so that you can keep giving your input! Also all below!
